bio: Călin is a Java Consultant and a very proud Neo4j Certified Professional with more than 7 years of experience in the area of software development. After finding out about Neo4j about 6 years ago, he now models everything as a graph. If you ever meet him, he will spend all of his time convincing you that whatever else you're doing is wrong. His use-cases include real-time recommendation systems, trust and reputation engines, and social ranking algorithms.
name: Călin Constantinov
shortBio: Călin is a Java Consultant and a very proud Neo4j Certified Professional with more than 7 years of experience in the area of software development.
title: Development Consultant | Neo4j Specialist
